name: cyber-sensei
description: Cyber Sensei is an all-in-one educational platform designed to create curricula and learning modules for K-12 students, with many additional features. Cyber Sensei is perfect for educators, schools, and parents looking to provide children with comprehensive and engaging educational experiences.
author: Luzzitto Tupaz <ltupa001@odu.edu> (https://github.com/Luzzitto/)
